1.0.name: wordpress/imincom-affiliate-plugin-for-wordpress
1.0.description:
Join our affiliate program to earn commission through your own WordPress blog using the ImIn.com Affiliate Plugin for WordPress! By choosing to partner with Imin.com, you are making the decision to create a personal experience for your sites visitors. From the moment they find us through your website, we will provide them with an opportunity to participate in the experience. We bring the businesses that we are featuring to our consumers through videos, blogs, and more.

The plugin gives users the ability to configure their settings within the Wordpress administrative console. Those are: * Color customizations of the widget (background, fonts, button) * Major Market selection that should be used to get deals * Referral ID to link your site with us (must register here for yours)
